p: At the end of the experiment, we counted the flowers and the seeds in ten randomly selected flowers on each A. sessilis plant to estimate total seed number for each individual. We also collected 20 fully-opened, similar-sized leaves from the top of each plant (each plant had hundreds of leaves). We mixed leaves from the same treatment and stored them at 4 °C for the beetle bioassay. Then, we harvested plants, rinsed roots to remove soil, and counted M. incognita root knots. We dried plants at 80 °C for 48 h and weighed them.
